reviewText: I'm a big fan of all the Get Healthy Now DVD series and the Doc's and Lecturers. Ive been slowly lean towards a Plant based diet for the past 5 yrs or so. These dvd's give great info. I highly recommond them!!

I have several of these: I find them quite educational & motivational.  I especially like the ones where they take medical stuff (like the effect of cholesterol on the body, or fat in the blood, or consuming diet of x% dairy turns cancer on/ off) and explain it simply, and with graphics.

2010 discs include these programs, most run +/- 1 hour:

--disc one--
NAVIGATING THRU HEALTH & MEDICAL MISINFORMATION -- Matthew Lederman, MD
PLANT STRONG: TAKING IT TO THE NEXT LEVEL -- Rip Esselstyn
METABOLISM & HUNGER -- Joel Fuhrman, MD
LONGEVITY & CANCER PROTECTION -- Joel Fuhrman, MD

--disc two--
ENDING THE CORONARY DISEASE EPIDEMIC -- Caldwell Esselstyn, MD
COOKING DEMOS -- Ann Esselstyn, Jeff Novick, Sabrina, Rand & Nina
HEALTHY LIVING MADE EASY -- Jeff Novick, MS, RD
I AM WHAT I EAT: MEETING MYSELF AT DINNER -- Rev. Heng Sure, PhD

--disc three--
DIET & M.S.: AUTOIMMUNE DISEASES -- John McDougall, MD
ANTIDOTE TO A MEAN WORLD -- John Robbins
THE STARCH SOLUTION -- John McDougall, MD
Q & A FROM AUDIENCE -- panel discussion with speakers

The packaging is a normal sized DVD case with good, sturdy plastic: two on a swinging insert and one on the back cover (ie, DVDs do not overlap).

I prefer to buy the DVD ... which I can keep as a reference ... than to attend the actual convention, although certainly many do both.

I got the whole kit & kaboodle of archives (2005 to present) for a discount at their website (veg source dot com) but most will want just the most recent edition.  Some of the older editions have major technical problems but, going by memory, these recent editions didn't.
This is an excellent dvd!  The presenters are terrific.  If you are plant strong it is invaluable.  So much to learn.
